title: U.S. Offshore Wind Power Auction Nets Record $4.37 Billion
sub_head: The sale of locations in federal waters marks a key moment in President Bidenâ€™s bid to create an U.S. offshore wind industry
body:
A U.S. auction of locations for offshore wind farms off the Atlantic coast resulted in a record $4.37 billion in winning bids, officials said Friday, a sign of robust interest in developing renewable energy in federal waters.
Auction winners for parcels covering nearly a half million acres off the coast of New York and New Jersey included Shell PLC, EDF Renewables Inc. and Engie SA .
